skills.name: Howling Riftcall
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attaches 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> to target character, and summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126032]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, attaches 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Golden Corrosion</color> to target character, and summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rifthound Skull</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Geo DMG, attaches 2 stacks of Golden Corrosion to target character, and summons Rifthound Skull.

skills.name: Golden Cankerbind
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 $[K5] to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> to all opposing characters.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Golden Corrosion</color> to all opposing characters.
skills.description: Deals 3 Geo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches Golden Corrosion to all opposing characters.
